prompts.deleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this {{itemType}}? This cannot be undone.
prompts.inDev: This feature is still in development.
prompts.removeItem: Are you sure you want to remove this {{itemType}}?

errors.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum file size is 5MB.

messages.projectDescription1: Praxis is an open source messaging platform designed for collaborative decision making. Proposals take center stage, offering a diverse range of voting models, with consensus as the default.
messages.projectDescription2: With Praxis, communities are empowered to collectively shape crucial aspects such as server name, settings, roles, and the planning of real-world events. This flexibility allows for diverse and dynamic social structures tailored to meet the specific needs of your community as it evolves over time.
messages.inDev: This project is still in development and is not yet intended for serious use outside of testing or research purposes.

headers.signIn: Sign in to join the conversation...

prompts.alreadyRegistered: You have already created an account.
prompts.enterEmailForReset: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
prompts.logOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
prompts.passwordResetEmailSent: An email to reset your password has been sent. Please check your inbox for further instructions. If you don't see the email, don't forget to look in your spam folder.
prompts.removeSelf: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? All of your data will be deleted and this cannot be undone.
prompts.removeUser: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this member's account? All of their data will be deleted and this cannot be undone.
prompts.upgradeAccount: Turn your anonymous session into a permanent account
prompts.signUpSubtext: Sign up to access proposal creation, voting, and more.
prompts.chooseAuthFlow: You can send this message anonymously right now or create an account to unlock more features. Which would you prefer?
prompts.usernameHelper: Set a username or let us generate one for you.

errors.shortName: Username must be at least 2 characters
errors.shortDisplayName: Display name must be at least 4 characters
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordTooLong: Password must be at most 64 characters long
errors.tooManyLoginAttempts: Too many login attempts. You may have been sent an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
errors.remove: There was an error removing this member.
errors.signUp: There was an error creating your account.
errors.update: There was an error updating your account.
errors.invalidResetPasswordToken: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.

errors.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum file size is 8MB.
errors.tooManyImages: You can upload a maximum of 5 images.

prompts.inviteRequired: You need to be invited before you can send messages.

messages.discordBotActive: Your Discord bot is active and ready to use
messages.discordNotConnected: Connect your Discord bot to enable Discord integration

help.discordClientId: Your Discord application's client ID from the Discord Developer Portal
help.discordBotApiUrl: The URL where your Discord bot is hosted

disconnectDiscord.title: Disconnect Discord Bot
disconnectDiscord.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect the Discord bot? This will remove the integration and stop all Discord functionality.

subheaders.viewServerRoles: Explore server roles transparently, see who holds them, and understand their permissions.

descriptions.createEvents: Allows members to create and plan events.
descriptions.createInvites: Allows members to invite new people to the server.
descriptions.manageComments: Allows members to remove or hide comments by other members.
descriptions.manageChannels: Allows members to create, edit, or delete channels.
descriptions.manageEvents: Allows members to remove or edit events created by other members.
descriptions.manageInvites: Allows members to create or delete invite links for the server.
descriptions.managePosts: Allows members to remove or hide posts by other members.
descriptions.manageQuestionnaires: Allows members vote on, review, and delete questionnaire tickets.
descriptions.manageQuestions: Allows members to create, edit, or delete membership questions.
descriptions.manageRoles: Allows members to create new roles as well as edit or delete other roles.
descriptions.manageRules: Allows members to create, edit, or delete rules for the server.
descriptions.manageServerSettings: Allows members to make changes to the server's settings.
descriptions.removeMembers: Allows members to remove other members from the server.
descriptions.removeProposals: Allows members to remove proposals posted by other members.

prompts.expiredOrInvalid: Your invite link is either expired or invalid.
prompts.inviteRequired: You need to be invited in order to sign up.
prompts.noInvites: No invites have been created yet.
